title: Had really toxic team...
body:
I had the most toxic team ever. Everyone reported me. Why? Because I carried them. They got mad at me because I carried them. They were like "Lux is a noob champ, takes no skill to carry. I'm using a champion that actually takes skill." -Teemo
"OMG NOOB" -Nidalee
"We'd still win without you b1tch" -Annie
Edit: I didn't report a single one of them btw to be nice :)

replies.body: They should, it doesn't even work.

They should disable the report button to be honest, unless you report for cheating, or AFK. Can't tell you how many times I got reported because some butthurt kid gets demolished then blames it on me or someone else on my team.
